Hero.subtitle: Powered by Your Expertise, <bold>Enhanced by AI</bold>. Experience the next generation of clinical workflow automation.

WhyChooseVesalius.title: The AI platform for patient conversations built for specialists, by specialists

language.title: Break the language barrier
language.description: Vesalius helps you understand your patients, no matter the language.

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: Vesalius keeps a clear record of interactions, reducing liability and ensuring compliance.

care.title: Better care
care.description: Automate intakes to reduce administration so you can focus on what matters.

accuracy.title: Improve your accuracy
accuracy.description: Eliminate manual errors and ensure consistent patient records.

Modules.title: We have a module for everyone

preConsultation.title: Pre Consultation
preConsultation.description: Intelligent conversational intake that structures patient history before they enter the room.

scribe.title: Scribe
scribe.description: The Scribe Bot listens in the background during the consultation (via mobile or desktop) and accurately captures the entire clinical conversation.

documentGeneration.title: Document Generation
documentGeneration.description: Put your data to work. Vesalius stops not at capturing info but uses it to generate your administration.

smartTriage.title: Smart Triage
smartTriage.description: Intelligent urgency assessment and routing to ensure patients get the right care at the right time. Optimize your schedule and prioritize effectively.

smartFollowUp.title: Smart Follow-ups
smartFollowUp.description: Automated check-ins that flag at-risk patients. Get alerts when responses deviate, enabling early intervention.

medication.title: Medication Manager
medication.description: Instantly digitize medication from photos of boxes, printed lists, or handwritten notes. Our AI extracts dosage, form, and prescription details directly into the platform.

Testimonials.title: Hear it straight from our users
Testimonials.statsTitle: Highly rated by patients and physicians throughout the entire industry

0.quote: Patients who use the chatbot feel better prepared for their consultation, leading to a more efficient and focused conversation with the doctor.
0.name: Farah

1.quote: Research has shown that patients who have used Vesalius feel better understood by their doctor compared to those who haven't used Vesalius.
1.name: Philippe

2.quote: The general feedback from the nurses is positive; they find the platform easy to use, which results in time savings and increased efficiency in their work.
2.name: Cynthia

Pricing.title: Transparent and fair pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your practice

free.name: Free
free.description: Start today with no obligations and see what our solution can do for your practice.

payAsYouUse.name: Pay-as-you-use
payAsYouUse.description: The flexibility to only pay for what you use. Perfect for variable needs and seasonal practices.
features: Pay only for what you use

individual.name: Individual
individual.description: Unlimited usage for one doctor without tracking credits. Simple and predictable.

team.name: Team
team.description: Ideal for practices with multiple doctors. Efficient collaboration, one affordable price.

organisation.name: Organisation
organisation.description: Do you have more than 5 doctors in your organisation? We offer custom solutions for larger practices and hospitals.
features: Unlimited usage, special support, and customised integrations at a tailored price.

Contact.title: We are here to help
Contact.subtitle: Any other questions? Get in touch with us

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: This page went to get a second opinion and never came back.

serverError.title: Internal Error
serverError.subtitle: Our servers need bed rest. We've called in a specialist.

generic.title: Something Went Wrong
generic.subtitle: Don't worry, it's not contagious. Our team is diagnosing the issue.

CookieConsent.title: We use cookies
CookieConsent.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function. Cannot be disabled.

functionality.title: Functionality Cookies
functionality.description: Remember your preferences like language and region.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site.

advertisement.title: Advertisement Cookies
advertisement.description: Used to show relevant ads based on your interests.
